Class Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.martinambrus.adminAnything.instrumentation.Tools

extends java.lang.Object
    Various IO tools used for class transformations.

        Gets class bytes from a stream.

        Returns:

      • addToLibPath

        public static void addToLibPath(java.lang.String path)
                         throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                java.lang.SecurityException,
                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Adds a a path to the current java.library.path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the library.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - When we couldn't add a path due to the JVM security restrictions.
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - When we couldn't find the sys_paths field in the loaded library.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - When we could not access the actual sys_paths field in the loaded library.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When we're dumbasses and can't remember what field we wanted.
